name: Stuck In A Garden 1
description:
-USE WASD TO MOVE, AND USE LEFT CLICK TO DELETE

-YOU CAN USE GARDENING TOOLS TO CUT THE BUSHES AND GET OUT OF THE 'MAZE'/ WALK THROUGH THEM AND LOSE TIME

-THIS GAME IS MADE FOR SPEED-RUNNING

-PLZ FEEL FREE TO LEAVE A COMENT WITH AN IDEA FOR THE GAME

-POST YOUR HIGH-SCORE BELOW

-CLICK ON THE GARDEN SHED TO REST HIGH-SCORE
